detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist and inset elastication on the outside of the hems.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the shoulders and an open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings at the shoulders and an open chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, long sleeves and a narrow, detachable belt at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front and mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide shoulder straps and a partially covered back section.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front and mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide shoulder straps and a partially covered back section.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with appliqués and a text motif.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and extended waistband with a metal decoration and press-stud. Zip fly, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
